cause.description:
Hundreds of Thousands of Gnomes are enslaved in Gardens across North America and the world. For too long we have let our neighbors usurp the rights of these gentle woodland peoples.
http://www.freethegnomes.com/
1. Stop Oppressive Gardening
2. Report Neighborhood Tyranny
3. Free the Gnomes
cause.name: Garden Gnome Liberation Front: Prince George Chapter
